svg.title: ST-13: Strategic Testing Coverage Heatmap Analyzer
svg.desc: Interactive testing dashboard that analyzes coverage data across entire codebase, highlights critical gaps, provides risk-based testing priorities, and tracks testing effectiveness over time with drill-down capabilities.
svg.text: Interactive coverage analysis with risk-based prioritization and strategic testing recommendations

g.text: ðŸ’¡ Click modules to drill down to file/function level
Critical Gaps: 3 modules | High Priority: 2 modules | Target: 85%
â€¢ Authentication Module: Increase from 18% to 85% coverage (Critical business risk)
â€¢ Security Layer: Comprehensive edge case testing, penetration test scenarios
â€¢ Resource Allocation: 2 senior engineers, AI-assisted test generation, 8 eng-days
â€¢ Jest for unit testing with AI edge case generation
â€¢ Cypress E2E for authentication flows
â€¢ Integration Services: Target 75% coverage with contract testing and service virtualization
â€¢ API Layer: Comprehensive endpoint testing, schema validation, rate limiting scenarios
â€¢ AI-powered API test creation from OpenAPI specs
â€¢ Contract testing with consumer-driven scenarios
â€¢ Load testing scenarios for critical API endpoints
â€¢ CI/CD integration with coverage gate validation
â€¢ Automated alerts for coverage regressions
â€¢ Coverage goals and team accountability
â€¢ Knowledge sharing on testing best practices
â€¢ Target: 85% overall coverage with 95%+ critical path coverage
â€¢ 60% reduction in production defects, 340% testing ROI
